hero.subtitle: Create a live photo wall for your event. Guests scan a QR code, snap photos, and watch them appear on the big screen instantly.

features.title: How it works
features.step1Desc: Create your event and share the QR code with guests. No app downloads required.
features.step2Desc: Guests open the web app and take photos directly from their phones.
features.step3Desc: Photos appear on your projector screen in real-time. Pure magic.

useCases.title: Perfect for any event
useCases.subtitle: From intimate gatherings to large celebrations

cta.title: Ready to create memories?
cta.subtitle: Set up your first event in under a minute. No credit card required.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to manage your events

dashboard.title: Your Events
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your live photo events
dashboard.noEventsDesc: Create your first event and start collecting photos
dashboard.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the event
dashboard.confirmError: Please type the event name correctly to confirm deletion

event.shareQr: Share this QR code with guests
event.waitingForPhotos: Waiting for guests to upload photos...
event.shareDesc: Guests scan this code to join and upload photos
event.projectorDesc: Open this on your big screen
event.photosDesc: Click on a photo to hide it from the live view
event.noPhotosMessage: No photos yet. Share the QR code with guests to start collecting!
event.confirmDeletePhoto: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?

camera.title: Take a Photo
camera.prompt: Take a photo or choose from gallery
camera.connectError: Could not connect. Please refresh the page.
camera.invalidFileType: Please select an image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, or HEIC)
camera.fileTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

join.title: Join an Event
join.subtitle: Enter the event code to start sharing photos
join.hostPrompt: Want to host your own event?

live.scanPrompt: Guests can scan the QR code to start sharing
live.keyboardHints: Press ESC to close • Double-click to reset zoom • Arrow keys to navigate
live.batchDownloadError: Batch download failed, please try again
live.noCommentsYet: No comments yet. Be the first!

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

pwa.installDesc: Add to your home screen for the best experience
pwa.iosInstallDesc: Tap the share button then "Add to Home Screen"

noCommentsYet: No comments yet. Be the first!
